page.title: 04MERCURY,LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: THERE ARE TWO LOCAL NEWSPAPERS IN MELBOURNE CALLED THE MERCURY AND NUNEWS.THE MERCURY COMES OUT FORTNIGHTLY AND COVERS MELBOURNE, TICKNALL AND CHELLASTON.IT IS PUBLISHED BY ERNIE BEARDSLEY OF COMMERCE STREET,MELBOURNE. THE MAIN STORIES THIS WEEK ARE THE 75TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE GIRL GUIDE MOVEMENT,THE RAISING OF Â£1000 BY MELBOURNE SINGERS FOR THE SCANNER APPEAL,AND MEMBERS OF THE MIDLAND BANK IN MELBOURNE DID A SPONSORED PARACHUTE JUMP TO RAISE MONEY FOR THE CHARITY, ACTION RESEARCH FOR THE CRIPPLED CHILD.LAST WEEK SAW THE TRADES EXHIBITION AT THE LEISURE CENTRE, ORGANISED BY THE ROTARY CLUB IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE PARISH COUNCIL.IT GAVE AN INTERESTING LOOK AT MELBOURNE'S INDUSTRIES.MY GRANDAD WRITES THE FARMING PAGE IN THE MERCURY
